sourcesContent:
details-task works!

Task Id: {{Id}}

Title : {{task.title}}

Description : {{task.description}}
DueDate: {{task.dueDate}}
Completed: {{task.completed}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router' import { Guid } from 'guid-typescript'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { ApiService } from '../services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details-task', templateUrl: './details-task.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details-task.component.css'] }) export class DetailsTaskComponent implements OnInit { Id: string = 'not loaded'; task$: any; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute, private apiService: ApiService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.route.paramMap.subscribe(p => this.findTask(p.get("Id"))); //this.getTaskById(this.Id).subscribe( // res => { // this.task$ = res; //}); } private findTask = (Id: string | null) => { this.Id = Id ?? 'not passed'; this.apiService.getTaskById(this.Id).subscribe(task => this.task$ = task); } getTaskById(id: string) { return this.apiService.getTaskById(id) } }
